sentence: Ringing does become a bit of an obsession , `` admits Stephanie Pattenden , master of the band at St. Mary Abbot and one of England 's best female ringers .
mut_sentence: A bit of an obsession is admitted to become part of ringing by Stephanie Pattenden, who is the master of the band at St. Mary Abbot and one of England's best female ringers.
reason: 句中的短语使用不太恰当，'admitted to become'应该是'admits to being'。另外，'the master of the band'可能会让人误解，通常来说，'master'一词在指代某个乐队的负责人时不太常用，可能会造成语义上的不清。

sentence: His spine crawled with a foreboding premonition as he asked one of his fellow tenants what had happened .
mut_sentence: A foreboding premonition made his spine crawl as he asked one of his fellow tenants about what happened.
reason: 句子在语法和语义上都是正确的。使用了形象的语言（foreboding premonition, spine crawl）来描述人物的恐惧感，并且句子结构清晰，符合英文表达习惯。

sentence: More recently , it is administrative harassment of foreign students , which is topical , with the minister of the interior ( `` Libération '' on 23 May ) declaring that France `` does not need foreign talent , bricklayers and waiters . ''
mut_sentence: More recently, the minister of the interior has declared that France 'does not need foreign talent, bricklayers, and waiters,' which makes the administrative harassment of foreign students a topical issue ('Libération' on 23 May).
reason: 这句话在语法和语义上都是正确的。它使用了正确的时态和引号来引用某人的话。句子的结构清晰，表达了法国内政部长最近的声明，以及这个声明与外国学生在行政上受到的骚扰成为热点问题的关系。

sentence: Although a GOP president may limit local benefits to the voter 's particular district/state , such a president is also likely to be more effective at preventing other districts/states and their legislators from bringing home the local benefits .
mut_sentence: Although a GOP president may limit local benefits to the voter's particular district/state, such a president is also likely to be more effective at preventing other districts/states and their legislators from bringing local benefits home.
reason: 该句子在语法和语义上都是正确的。尽管句子较长，但它遵循了英语中的复合句结构，使用了让步状语从句（Although引导），主句结构清晰，表达了一个合理的观点，即GOP的总统可能会限制特定选区的本地利益，但同时也可能更有效地阻止其他选区和立法者将利益带回家。这个观点没有违反常识，也没有语法错误。

sentence: On Thursday , the widely followed trial of Steven J. Hayes , who was convicted of killing three members of a Cheshire , Conn. , family , is set to come to an official end with the judge 's imposition of the death sentence voted for by the jury .
mut_sentence: On Thursday, the widely followed trial of Steven J. Hayes, who killed three members of a Cheshire, Conn., family, is set to come to an official end with the judge imposing the death sentence that was voted for by the jury.
reason: 这句话在语法和语义上都是正确的。它使用了正确的时态和语态，句子结构清晰，表达了一个具体的事件，没有违反常识或法律程序。

sentence: The purpose of education is to encourage young men and women to realize their full academic potential .
mut_sentence: The encouragement of young men and women to realize their full academic potential is the purpose of education.
reason: 这句话在语法和语义上都是正确的。主语是'the encouragement of young men and women'，谓语是'is'，宾语是'the purpose of education'。句子表达的意思是鼓励年轻人实现他们的全部学术潜力是教育的目的，这符合常识和教育的基本理念。

sentence: Vicar Marshall admits to mixed feelings about this issue , since he is both a vicar and an active bell-ringer himself .
mut_sentence: Mixed feelings about this issue are admitted by Vicar Marshall, since he is both a vicar and an active bell-ringer himself.
reason: 这句话在语法和语义上都是正确的。使用了正确的时态和语态，表达了Vicar Marshall对某一问题有复杂的感情，并且给出了原因——因为他既是牧师也是活跃的钟铃敲击者。

sentence: `` It does suggest that that there could be other ways to form life , not just how life formed on early Earth , '' said Foster , who was not part of Wolfe-Simon 's research team .
mut_sentence: Foster, who was not part of Wolfe-Simon's research team, said it does suggest that there could be other ways to form life, not just how life formed on early Earth.
reason: 这句话在语法和语义上都是正确的。主语Foster明确指出了说话者不是Wolfe-Simon研究团队的一部分，并且句子表达了关于生命可能以不同于早期地球上形成的方式形成的观点，这并不违反常识，而是提出了一个科学假设。

sentence: Potential candidates may be discouraged from running less by the congressional salary than by the prospect of defeat at the hands of a Democratic opponent .
mut_sentence: The prospect of defeat at the hands of a Democratic opponent may discourage potential candidates from running less by the congressional salary than by it.
reason: 句中的「running less by the congressional salary than by it」使用了错误的比较结构，造成了语法上的混乱。正确的表达应该是比较两个不同的对象，但在这里，第二个「by it」指代不明确，不清楚它指代的是「congressional salary」还是其他未明确提到的内容。此外，「running less by」也不是一个常见的表达方式。正确的表达可能是「running less because of the congressional salary than because of something else」这样的结构。

sentence: Third , the theory suggests why legislators who pay too much attention to national policy making relative to local benefit-seeking have lower security in office .
mut_sentence: Third, the theory suggests that legislators who pay too much attention to national policy making relative to local benefit-seeking lower their security in office.
reason: 这句话在语法和语义上都是正确的。'Third'作为开头，可能是在列举事项中的第三点。句子结构清晰，主语是'the theory'，谓语是'suggests'，宾语从句是'that legislators...lower their security in office'。从句中，'legislators'是主语，'who pay too much attention to national policy making relative to local benefit-seeking'是一个定语从句，修饰'legislators'，而'lower their security in office'是谓语，表达的意思是理论认为过分关注国家政策制定而非地方利益寻求的立法者会降低他们在职位上的安全感。这个句子没有明显的语法错误，也没有违背常识。

sentence: The quivers move through my house every few minutes at unpredictable intervals , and the mouse that 's been living in my kitchen has taken refuge under my desk .
mut_sentence: The quivers are moving through my house every few minutes at unpredictable intervals, and the mouse that has been living in my kitchen has taken refuge under my desk.
reason: 通常情况下，颤动（quivers）不会以有规律的时间间隔在房子内移动，这不符合常理。此外，虽然老鼠可能会在室内不同地方寻找避难所，但是这句话中描述的情景与日常经验相违背，因为通常老鼠不会因为颤动而改变藏身之处。

sentence: -- Students should move up the educational ladder as their academic potential allows .
mut_sentence: The educational ladder should be moved up by Students as their academic potential allows.
reason: 句中的'moved up by Students'在语法上不正确，应该使用主动语态，并且'Students'应该使用复数形式。正确的表达应该是'moved up by students'（注意小写的'students'）。另外，'as their academic potential allows'这个短语在这里的用法也不太自然，它可能会让人误解为学生的潜力决定了梯子的移动，应该使用更清晰的表达方式。

sentence: Alimta increased the survival time of patients with malignant pleural mesothelioma .
mut_sentence: The survival time of patients with malignant pleural mesothelioma was increased by Alimta.
reason: 这句话在语法和语义上都是正确的。使用了被动语态，说明了Alimta（一种药物）对恶性胸膜间皮瘤患者的生存时间有所增加，这符合医学研究的表述方式。
